src:
Data dan Fakta Liga Champions: Barcelona vs Slavia Praha
04 Nov 2019, 16:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemimpin klasemen Barcelona akan menjamu tim juru kunci Slavia Praha pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Camp Nou ini.
Pada matchday 3, yang merupakan pertemuan perdana mereka, Barcelona mengalahkan Slavia Praha 2-1 di Republik Ceko. Barcelona unggul lewat gol Lionel Messi menit 3, dan disamakan oleh tuan rumah melalui gol Jan Boril menit 50, kemudian Barcelona memastikan kemenangan berkat bunuh diri Peter Olayinka menit 57.
Barcelona saat ini memimpin klasemen dengan 7 poin, diikuti Inter Milan (4), Borussia Dortmund (4), dan Slavia Praha (1).
Matchday 1: Inter Milan 1-1 Slavia Praha, Borussia Dortmund 0-0 Barcelona.
Matchday 2: Slavia Praha 0-2 Borussia Dortmund, Barcelona 2-1 Inter Milan.
Matchday 3: Slavia Praha 1-2 Barcelona, Inter Milan 2-0 Borussia Dortmund.
Matchday 5 (27 November 2019): Slavia Praha vs Inter Milan, Barcelona vs Borussia Dortmund.
Lionel Messi mencetak gol pertamanya untuk Barcelona di Liga Champions musim ini mengalahkan Slavia Praha pada matchday 3.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Champions League Data and Facts: Barcelona vs Slavia Prague
Nov 04 2019, 16:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona league leaders will host Slavia Prague caretaker team on Matchday 4 Group F Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at Camp Nou.
On Matchday 3, which was their first meeting, Barcelona defeated Slavia Prague 2-1 in the Czech Republic. Barcelona took the lead through Lionel Messi's goal 3 minutes, and was equalized by the hosts through Jan Boril's 50th minute goal, then Barcelona sealed the victory thanks to Peter Olayinka's suicide 57 minutes.
Barcelona currently leads the standings with 7 points, followed by Inter Milan (4), Borussia Dortmund (4) and Slavia Prague (1).
Matchday 1: Inter Milan 1-1 Slavia Prague, Borussia Dortmund 0-0 Barcelona.
Matchday 2: Slavic Prague 0-2 Borussia Dortmund, Barcelona 2-1 Inter Milan.
Matchday 3: Slavia Prague 1-2 Barcelona, Inter Milan 2-0 Borussia Dortmund.
Matchday 5 (27 November 2019): Slavia Prague vs. Inter Milan, Barcelona vs Borussia Dortmund.
Lionel Messi scored his first goal for Barcelona in the Champions League this season beating Slavia Prague on matchday 3.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
